docs.text:
Welcome to Keeplight!


KeepLight lets you monitor and run performance reports against your sites and web applications.


Sites


Configure and run latency or Lighthouse tests against your websites.


Assets


Monitor latency to your different assets around the world.
docs.title: Home

docs.text: KeepLight lets you monitor and run performance reports against your sites and web applications.

docs.title: Sites

docs.text:
Create User


$ curl -s -X POST \
  ${HOST}/api/register \
  -d '{
    
email
: 
test03@gmail.com
,
    
password
: 
hunter1

  }'

{
  
active
: false,
  
authorization_token
: 
token
,
  
email
: 
two@email.com
,
  
user_id
: 3,
  
message
: 
User created successfully!
,
  
name
: 
Nick
,
  
joined
: 
2017-08-27T13:17:06.213240067-04:00

}




Get New Session


$ curl -s -X POST \
  ${HOST}/api/sessions/info \
  -H 'Authorization: Basic 
base64Encode(email:password)
'




Get Session Info


$ curl -s -X GET \
  ${HOST}/api/sessions/info \
  -H 'Authorization: Bearer 
token
'

{
  
active
: false,
  
email
: 
test02@gmail.com
,
  
exp
: 1503689745,
  
user_id
: 4,
  
username
: 
test01

}
docs.title: Sessions

docs.text:
$ curl -s -X POST \
  ${HOST}/api/register \
  -d '{
     email :  test03@gmail.com ,
     password :  hunter1 
  }'

{
   active : false,
   authorization_token :  token ,
   email :  two@email.com ,
   user_id : 3,
   message :  User created successfully! ,
   name :  Nick ,
   joined :  2017-08-27T13:17:06.213240067-04:00 
}
docs.title: Create User

docs.text:
$ curl -s -X GET \
  ${HOST}/api/sessions/info \
  -H 'Authorization: Bearer  token '

{
   active : false,
   email :  test02@gmail.com ,
   exp : 1503689745,
   user_id : 4,
   username :  test01 
}

'
